title: Kerry Katona faces the wrath of Katie Price after cosying up to her ex Kieran Haylor
text:

Katie Price will be fuming as her former pal Kerry Katona has been pictured cosying up to her ex husband Kieran Haylor.

The celebs were snapped posing for a delighted photo together, leaning in close to each other and beaming for the camera.

Katie, 41, separated from Kieran in 2017, and they are still legally married despite Katie being engaged to now ex fiance Kris Boyson since.

They split after Kieran cheated on Katie with two of her best friends and with their children's nanny.

(Image: Bob Grey / BACKGRID)

Kerry, 39 and Kieran, 32, were hanging out last night at Tulley's Shocktober Fest Scream Park, a Halloween party packed with famous including Love Island's Curtis Pritchard and Molly Mae Hague, Jess Impiazzi, Shane Ritchie, and Ricky Rayment.

Kerry wrapped up warm for the occasion in a long back puffer coat, Burberry scarf, and a stylish black baker boy cap with a red handbag to add a splash of colour to the ensemble.

She looked stunning with gold eyeshadow and long eyelashes complimenting her dewy skin.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

Kieran was also not taking any chances with the weather with a thick white hoodie on under a pink denim jacket.

He smiled as he stood with his arm around Michelle Pentecost - who was granted a restraining order against Katie Price after she abused her outside their children's primary schol.

(Image: Getty Images)

Kerry also brought along her family - boyfriend Ryan Mahoney and four of her children.

Personal trainer Ryan held her youngest child Dylan-Jorge, 5, who Kerry had with late third husband George Kay.

Lilly-Sue, 16, who Kerry had with first husband Brian McFadden, Heidi, 12, and Maxwell, 11, with second spouse Mark Croft, were also in attendance.

(Image: Bob Grey / BACKGRID)

Kerry and Katie have already been at loggerheads recently as Kerry criticised Katie's latest surgery spree.

Speaking in her New! Column, Kerry said: "Seeing pictures of my friend Katie Price after her recent surgery was pretty awful. Those wounds!"

A source told The Sun that a 'p****ed off' Katie felt 'stabbed in the back' by Kerry's comments.

(Image: Rex)

(Image: Quest Red)

The insider said: "Katie is upset that Kerry commented publicly about her recent surgery rather than pick up the phone or message her.

"She's actually feeling furious and p***ed off about the whole thing because she thinks Kerry has stabbed her in the back."

Kerry also recently declared in her column that she wanted to record a song with Katie - but once KP sees these pictures, we're guessing that isn't going to happen.
description: Kerry Katona and Katie Price have been spatting recently - and Kerry has now cosied up to Katie's ex husband, risking infuriating her
